title: SullyThe1
author: SullyThe1
content: Greetings mods! I am here to request access to RSS feeds. I found instructions somewhere but the link (example: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?type=rss;action=.xml;sa=recent;boards=52;limit=10) led to this: https://pasteboard.co/ukMa2LnrAkwQ.png What do I need to do to gain access? I would like to be able to write a Discord bot to automatically post new posts in a certain topic. Thanks!

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.created_time: May 14, 2022, 02:08:47 AMLast edit: May 14, 2022, 02:20:11 AM by PX-Z
comments.body: Here's an api made by mprep [C# / .NET] Unofficial Bitcointalk API - Get info from boards, topics and posts[1]. Feel free to check it.I know the ninjastic.space website or tryninja or loycev make something like this as well.I found the thread of tryninja about the api, kindly chrck here[2]I know its not in rss or xml format but you can optimize it or use it to get the latest posts or every post made in this forum. Edit: Here's a confirmed discord project that can fetch latest post of certain board made using tryninja's api tool[3][1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic1783893.0[2] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5273824.0[3] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5247383.msg58501819#msg58501819
